languages.text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что данное членовредительство есть часть некоего богохульного ритуала обращения к {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагу{/g}, а не обычное надругательство над пленными".

traits.locale_text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что данное членовредительство есть часть некоего богохульного ритуала обращения к {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагу{/g}, а не обычное надругательство над пленными".

languages.text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."
languages.original_text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что данное членовредительство есть часть некоего богохульного ритуала обращения к {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагу{/g}, а не обычное надругательство над пленными".

traits.locale_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some profane ritual with the intent to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} rather than a plain case of prisoner brutalisation."
"I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some profane ritual with the intent to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} rather than a plain case of prisoner brutalisation."
"I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a plain case of prisoner torture."
"I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a plain case of prisoner torture."
"I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."
"I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

languages.text: "Meine Hypothese ist, dass dieser Verstümmelungsakt keine simple Folter von Gefangenen ist, sondern vielmehr Teil eines blasphemischen Rituals, welches den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} beschwören soll."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Hypothese ist, dass dieser Verstümmelungsakt keine simple Folter von Gefangenen ist, sondern vielmehr Teil eines blasphemischen Rituals, welches den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} beschwören soll."

languages.text: « Je subodore que, plus qu'un simple acte de torture, cette mutilation fait partie d'un rituel impie censé invoquer le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: « Je subodore que, plus qu'un simple acte de torture, cette mutilation fait partie d'un rituel impie censé invoquer le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. »

languages.text: “我猜测，这种残害行为并不是简简单单的折磨，而是某种典型亵渎仪式的一部分，目的是召唤{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}。”
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: “我猜测，这种残害行为并不是简简单单的折磨，而是某种亵渎仪式的一部分，目的是召唤{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}。”

languages.text: 「この変異発現は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}を呼びだすための異端儀式の一環であると、仮定する。囚人への拷問で通常起こりうるケースとはかけ離れている」
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: 「この変異発現は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}を呼びだすための異端儀式の一環であると、仮定する。囚人への拷問で通常起こりうるケースとは、かけ離れている」

languages.text: «Mi hipótesis es que este acto de mutilación forma parte de algún ritual blasfemo destinado a invocar al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, más que un típico caso de tortura de prisioneros».
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: «Mi hipótesis es que este acto de mutilación forma parte de algún ritual blasfemo destinado a invocar al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, más que un simple caso de tortura de prisioneros».

languages.text: "Bu sakatlama eyleminin, tipik bir mahkûm işkencesi vakasından ziyade {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} yakarmayı amaçlayan bir kâfir ayininin parçası olduğunu tahmin ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that this act of mutilation is part of some blasphemous ritual intended to invoke the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, rather than a typical case of prisoner torture."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sakatlama eyleminin, tipik bir mahkûm işkencesi vakasından ziyade {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'na yakarmayı amaçlayan bir kâfir ayininin parçası olduğunu tahmin ediyorum."
